data.name: ChooseGameVersion
data.value: Your game version could not be detected. Please choose your version:

data.value: Select your game version

data.name: DownloadFixTitle
data.value: Downloading ModAPI Fix

data.name: Downloading
data.value: Downloading

data.name: DownloadOriginFix
data.value: EA App and Origin users need to download an additional file in order for mods to work. If you press OK, the launcher will download and apply this additional file.

data.name: ExtractingFiles
data.value: Extracting files...

data.name: FileNeeded
data.value: File needed

data.name: GalacticAdventuresNotExecuted
data.value: Something went wrong while starting or injecting your mods into Spore. The game may start, but some mods will not work correctly. Please report the issue, along with a screenshot of this error, using the instructions at the following website:

data.name: MightNotWork
data.value: The Launcher Kit requires Galactic Adventures and one of the following three game versions: 3.0.0.2818 (disc only), 3.1.0.22, or 3.1.0.29. If your game crashes or mods do not work, download the latest version of Spore and Galactic Adventures. Disc users must instead manually install patch 1.5.1 after installing Galactic Adventures.

data.name: MightNotWorkTitle
data.value: ModAPI might not work

data.name: ProcessNotResumed
data.value: Process thread could not be resumed.

data.name: ProcessNotStarted
data.value: Could not start process.

data.name: SteamLastVersion
data.value: Do you have the most recent patch (released on March 20th, 2017 if nothing newer is out since) installed?

data.name: SteamLastVersionTitle
data.value: Do you have the latest version?

data.name: VersionNotDetected
data.value: Your version could not be detected, ModAPI won't load.

data.name: DownloadComplete
data.value: Download complete. Launch game now?

data.name: DownloadCompleteTitle
data.value: Download complete

data.name: IncompatibleMod
data.value: Incompatible Mod Detected

data.name: UnsupportedDllVersion
data.value: The following mods cannot be loaded because they require a greater version of the ModAPI Core DLLs. Please, restart the launcher and allow it to update.

data.name: UnsupportedDllVersionTitle
data.value: Error: some mods could not be loaded

data.name: CannotApplySteamFix
data.value: Could not apply the Steam fix. To apply it, you can do one of these two options: - Re-execute the Launcher with Administrator Privileges. or - Create a file called 'steam_appid.txt', with the numbers '17390' inside, in the folder $PATH$

data.name: CannotApplySteamFixTitle
data.value: Could not apply the Steam fix

data.name: SporeModLoaderDetected
data.value:
SporeModLoader has been detected, running the Launcher Kit alongside SporeModLoader is unsupported.
You have the the following options: - Remove SporeModLoader to use the Launcher Kit by removing $PATH$ - Use SporeModLoader instead of the Launcher Kit

data.name: SporeModLoaderDetectedTitle
data.value: SporeModLoader detected
